title: Pump Up The Jams!
content: This place could use some music... Something original?

title: Add An Avatar
content: Let's add some more personality to this place with a mini Brandon. Put him in the corner and provide helpful insight about the website.

title: Add a Window
content: Every room needs a window, right? Maybe it can reflect the weather in my area?

title: Add Night Mode
content: This place should look like laser tag when the switch is flipped!

title: Make Mobile-Friendly
content: Most people you're gonna show this too will be on their phones! Think about the end-users!

title: Add Credits Page
content: Let's not forget who helped you along the way!

title: Flesh out Channel Art
content: The goal of this website is to function like a Wii menu.

title: Flesh Out Drawer
content: Add some more CSS blocks under the TV. It can be the spot to add easter eggs...later!
